name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adobe stock image title and keyword generator + OpenAI API . Free version

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension generate title and keywords for your images or videos on Adobe Stock! you need your OpenAI API key

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Boost your Adobe Stock uploads with optimized titles and keywords! This extension leverages the power of OpenAI's API to automatically generate relevant and effective titles and keywords for your images or videos. Simply input your media, and the extension will analyze it to suggest the best descriptive terms to enhance visibility and discoverability on Adobe Stock. All you need is your OpenAI API key to get started! Save time and increase the reach of your content with this smart, AI-powered tool.
This is free version its limited to 10 keywords. you can buy full version on website.
